remarks: A power series variable is an element of the base set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mvrf.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
mvrf.v $e |- V = ( I mVar R ) $.
mvrf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
mvrf.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
mvrf.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mvrcl2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
mvrcl2 $p |- ( ph -> ( V ` X ) e. B ) $.
